DiscussMD5: CAT II - XO uses Redis for server-side session tokens
CheckMD5: Verify Redis configured and running, no client-side sessions
FixMD5: N/A - XO uses Redis by design

DiscussMD5: CAT II - TLS integrity protection for XO sessions
CheckMD5: Verify TLS 1.2+ with strong ciphers, no weak algorithms

DiscussMD5: CAT II - TLS confidentiality protection for XO sessions
CAT II - XO must use OS system clock for log timestamps
CheckMD5: Verify log timestamps match system time
FixMD5: N/A - XO uses system clock by design

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify session ID generator uses CSPRNG (cryptographically secure PRNG)
CheckMD5: Check Express.js session middleware and Redis session generator configuration
FixMD5: N/A - XO uses Express.js + Redis with secure session ID generation by default

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify session ID length is â‰¥128 bits (16 bytes)
CheckMD5: Check Express.js session configuration for ID length, sample Redis session IDs
FixMD5: Configure express-session with genid function using crypto.randomBytes(16) minimum

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify session ID uses full alphanumeric + symbol character set
CheckMD5: Sample Redis session IDs and analyze character diversity
FixMD5: N/A - XO uses base64/hex encoding which maximizes character set usage

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify session ID entropy source is configurable/definable (CSPRNG source)
CheckMD5: Verify crypto.randomBytes uses /dev/urandom or system CSPRNG, check for configurable entropy
FixMD5: N/A - Node.js crypto module uses OS-provided CSPRNG by default

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify configuration backup/version control exists for disaster recovery
CheckMD5: Check for config backups, git repository, or documented baseline
FixMD5: Implement config backup strategy (git, etckeeper, or manual backups)

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify systemd service has proper failure handling (Restart policy, timeout settings)
CheckMD5: Check systemd service file for Restart=, TimeoutStopSec=, KillMode= settings
FixMD5: Configure systemd service with Restart=on-failure, proper timeout and kill settings

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify LUKS/dm-crypt encryption for XO data directories with AES-256
CheckMD5: Check lsblk for encrypted partitions, verify AES-256 cipher, check XO data paths
FixMD5: Implement LUKS encryption for /opt/xo and /var/lib/xo-server partitions

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify XO data directories on separate partition/filesystem from OS
CheckMD5: Use df and mount to verify /opt/xo or /var/lib/xo-server on separate partition
FixMD5: Create separate partition for XO data, mount at /opt/xo, migrate data

DiscussMD5: CAT II - Verify rate limiting, connection limits, and resource throttling
CheckMD5: Check Nginx rate limiting, XO config for maxConnections, firewall rules, fail2ban
FixMD5: Configure rate limiting in Nginx/XO config, set connection limits, enable fail2ban

DiscussMD5: CAT II - IP consistency for management sessions
CheckMD5: Verify management sessions maintain consistent source IP
